verses.verse: וַתְּדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> spake מִרְיָ֤ם <WH4813> And Miriam וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> and Aaron בְּמֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> against Moses עַל־ <WH5921> because אֹד֛וֹת <WH182> because of הָאִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman הַכֻּשִׁ֖ית <WH3569> Cushi אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom לָקָ֑ח <WH3947> whom he had married כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman כֻשִׁ֖ית <WH3569> Cushi לָקָֽח׃ <WH3947> for he had married

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they said הֲרַ֤ק <WH7535> but אַךְ־ <WH389> indeed בְּמֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Moses דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> indeed spoken יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Hath the LORD הֲלֹ֖א <WH3808> not גַּם־ <WH1571> again בָּ֣נוּ דִבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> spoken וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> heard יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> also by us? And the LORD

וְהָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> (Now the man מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses [עָנָו כ] (עָנָ֣יו <WH6035> humble ק) מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [was] very מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> any הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> above all the men אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> was on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> which [were] upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> land ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD פִּתְאֹ֗ם <WH6597> suddenly אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> and unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מִרְיָ֔ם <WH4813> and unto Miriam צְא֥וּ <WH3318> Come out שְׁלָשְׁתְּכֶ֖ם <WH7969> ye three אֶל־ <WH413> to אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> unto the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <WH3318> came out שְׁלָשְׁתָּֽם׃ <WH7969> And they three

וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> came down יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD בְּעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> in the pillar עָנָ֔ן <WH6051> of the cloud וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> [in] the door הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and called אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> Aaron וּמִרְיָ֔ם <WH4813> and Miriam וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <WH3318> came forth שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> and they both

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֣א <WH4994> now דְבָרָ֑י <WH1697> now my words אִם־ <WH518> If יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> is a נְבִ֣יאֲכֶ֔ם <WH5030> If there be a prophet יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> among you [I] the LORD בַּמַּרְאָה֙ <WH4759> unto him in a vision אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> about אֶתְוַדָּ֔ע <WH3045> will make myself known בַּחֲל֖וֹם <WH2472> unto him in a dream אֲדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> [and] will speak בּֽוֹ׃

לֹא־ <WH3808> Not כֵ֖ן <WH3651> so עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> My servant מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all בֵּיתִ֖י <WH1004> in all mine house נֶאֱמָ֥ן <WH539> [is] not so who [is] faithful הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

פֶּ֣ה <WH6310> mouth אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֞ה <WH6310> to mouth אֲדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> With him will I speak בּ֗וֹ וּמַרְאֶה֙ <WH4758> even apparently וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not בְחִידֹ֔ת <WH2420> and not in dark speeches וּתְמֻנַ֥ת <WH8544> and the similitude יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יַבִּ֑יט <WH5027> shall he behold וּמַדּ֙וּעַ֙ <WH4069> Why לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְרֵאתֶ֔ם <WH3372> wherefore then were ye not afraid לְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> to speak בְּעַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> against my servant בְמֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses
וַיִּֽחַר <WH2734> was kindled אַ֧ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God בָּ֖ם וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃ <WH1980> departed

וְהֶעָנָ֗ן <WH6051> And the cloud סָ֚ר <WH5493> departed מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> over הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> from off the tabernacle וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold מִרְיָ֖ם <WH4813> and behold Miriam מְצֹרַ֣עַת <WH6879> [became] leprous כַּשָּׁ֑לֶג <WH7950> [white] as snow וַיִּ֧פֶן <WH6437> looked אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> and Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> toward מִרְיָ֖ם <WH4813> upon Miriam וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold מְצֹרָֽעַת׃ <WH6879> and behold [she was] leprous

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses בִּ֣י <WH994> Alas אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> my lord אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֨א <WH4994> not תָשֵׁ֤ת <WH7896> I beseech thee lay עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> and חַטָּ֔את <WH2403> not the sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נוֹאַ֖לְנוּ <WH2973> upon us wherein we have done foolishly וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <WH2398> and wherein we have sinned

אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֥א <WH4994> Oh תְהִ֖י <WH1961> become כַּמֵּ֑ת <WH4191> dead אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whose בְּצֵאתוֹ֙ <WH3318> when he cometh out מֵרֶ֣חֶם <WH7358> womb אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> of his mother's וַיֵּאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> consumed חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> is half בְשָׂרֽוֹ׃ <WH1320> of whom the flesh

וַיִּצְעַ֣ק <WH6817> cried מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֵ֕ל <WH410> her now O God נָ֛א <WH4994> pray רְפָ֥א <WH7495> Heal נָ֖א <WH4994> pray לָֽהּ׃ פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> If her father יָרֹ֤ק <WH3417> had but יָרַק֙ <WH3417> spit בְּפָנֶ֔יהָ <WH6440> in her face הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִכָּלֵ֖ם <WH3637> should she not be ashamed שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days תִּסָּגֵ֞ר <WH5462> close up שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> seven יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> from the camp וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and after תֵּאָסֵֽף׃ <WH622> that let her be received

וַתִּסָּגֵ֥ר <WH5462> was shut מִרְיָ֛ם <WH4813> And Miriam מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> from the camp שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not נָסַ֔ע <WH5265> journeyed עַד־ <WH5704> until הֵאָסֵ֖ף <WH622> was brought מִרְיָֽם׃ <WH4813> not till Miriam

וְאַחַ֛ר <WH310> And afterward נָסְע֥וּ <WH5265> removed הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people מֵחֲצֵר֑וֹת <WH2698> from Hazeroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <WH6290> of Paran פ
